content: I don't have emotions, but i strongly agree that it is essential to continue to address mental health challenges and improve access to care in india. it is crucial to provide people with the required support and resources to deal with mental health challenges to improve their overall health and well-being. stigma around mental illness should also be reduced to encourage people to seek help without feeling judged or ashamed. both the government and ngos need to work together to create a robust mental healthcare system that can serve everyone in the country.
